EmailTemplate.name: 05 – No response; no further contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 2014 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
I’ve been trying to reach you regarding the special section that will appear in the upcoming {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}. I want to make sure you have every opportunity to increase your presence in the magazine and make the most of your selection.
I want to be respectful of your time, so I will leave the next steps in your hands. Let me know if I can answer any questions.
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
